propertyDefinition.name: NumberOfMonitored
propertyDefinition.description: Number of monitored components for performance

propertyDefinition.name: MinTimes
propertyDefinition.description: Minimum acquisition time taken for each monitored component

propertyDefinition.name: MaxTimes
propertyDefinition.description: Maximum acquisition time taken for each monitored component

propertyDefinition.name: AvgTimes
propertyDefinition.description: Average acquisition time taken for each monitored component

propertyDefinition.name: Percentages
propertyDefinition.description: Percentage of acquisition time taken for each monitored component
